name: acephalous

without a head: an acephalous monster
without a leader: They live in small groups with an acephalous social organization. an informal, acephalous committee
More examplesFewer examplesSome of the creatures are very incompletely formed, especially those which are acephalous. The term MOOC, coined about 2008, was originally applied to informal acephalous online-learning communities.This is essentially a transnational fascist radicalizing movement. But it's an acephalous movement. It has no head.
